document_data.name: Drunken Inhale
document_data.mainbody: '''''Drunken inhale''''' was a [[spell]] of the [[evocation]] school of [[magic]] used by the [[djinni]].
document_data.Effects: This spell had multiple effects. It dealt damage to creatures, intoxicated them, and pulled them towards the spellcaster. ''Drunken inhale'' intoxicated and pulled all creatures caught in a {{SI|15'|'"|long=yes}} cone in front of the caster and the drunkenness lasted for the next six seconds, giving the creatures momentary vulnerability in battle.
